headline: Mondelez-Hershey – no longer a sweet deal?
summary: Mondelez’s plans for a buyback and its “focus” more on “bolt-on” M&A suggest to some onlookers it may think again about pursuing Hershey.

raw.headline: Mondelez-Hershey – no longer a sweet deal?
raw.summary: Mondelez’s plans for a buyback and its “focus” more on “bolt-on” M&A suggest to some onlookers it may think again about pursuing Hershey.

headline: MDLZ Approves a $9-B Repurchase Plan: Here's What You Should Know
summary: Mondelez authorizes the latest share repurchase authorization of up to $9 billion of its Class A common stock.

raw.headline: MDLZ Approves a $9-B Repurchase Plan: Here's What You Should Know
raw.summary: Mondelez authorizes the latest share repurchase authorization of up to $9 billion of its Class A common stock.

headline: RITZ Bits Cracker Sandwiches Heat Up The Snack Aisle With Bold New Spicy Queso Flavor
summary: For the first time in nearly a decade, RITZ Bits Cracker Sandwiches are introducing a brand-new flavor to heat things up: Spicy Queso. Offering a savory, flavorful taste, RITZ Bits Spicy Queso Cracker Sandwiches are a delicious addition to spice up your snack collection – whether you're munching at home or snacking on the go.

headline: 2 Ideal Buys From 50 'Safer' Dividends In 100 December Sustainables
